channel.title: Item Packer - Packs any items from cache in a click!
channel.description:
RuneScape Item Packer
Hello, and welcome to this thread. You always wanted to get current RuneScape items in a instant and don't want to wait for another person to get them for you and release it to the whole community - Right? Well this tool allows you to get current RuneScape items from the cache in a click of a button, and updates are free!
Media:
Picture of program first starts up:
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/svidrq.png[/img]
Picture of program with cache loaded and cache version set:
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/a4r688.png[/img]
Picture of Item Panel:
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/nmangy.png[/img]
___________________________
Features:
* Item Packer * RS377D Definition Writer. * Item List Creator. * Item Configuration Creator/Integer Creator (Noobs).
The Price for this amazing program is $15 All payments are too be made through PayPal and given as a GIFT this way the full amount is sent correctly.
Small Contract to ensure the safety of the program and the buyers and sellers: By buying this product you agree to the following:
~ The buyer will NOT resell this product without written consent from the original poster Seller. ~ Payment will be made in the full fee of 20$. ~ You agree not to retract the money or initiate a dispute against the seller.
Contract here ^ If you cannot read it switch to "bluefox" theme.
This is a low price for everything you're getting:
~ FREE[/COLOR] Updates. ~ One Time Fee. ~ Add-on's for an additional fee of only 5$.
~ Note: An Add-on is different from an update{ - An Add-on as a completely new feature added onto the product. - An update is an improvement on a current feature in the product.

item.title: Item Packer - Packs any items from cache in a click!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Gangster, post:7, topic:404263”]Oh well, MoparScape fucks don’t know the value in this thing. That’s how MoparScape always been, bunch of retarded pricks that can’t code for shit and critizing this program because they cannot afford it. Your loss.[/quote]More like you guys are idiots for thinking this would be of any use, as if an items already in the cache you wouldn’t need the ints or anything to use it as a custom item?

But anyway, no buying or selling is allowed here.

Read full topic
